meanings.sent1: The snake sibilates when it feels threatened.
meanings.sent2: The kettle sibilates as it comes to a boil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child sibilates to imitate a snake.
meanings.sent4: The wind sibilates through the trees like a whispering secret.
meanings.sent5: The steam sibilates softly, filling the room with warmth.

meanings.sent1: The cat sibilates when it sees a bird outside.
meanings.sent2: The leaking pipe sibilates in the quiet of the night.
meanings.sent3: The teapot sibilates loudly, demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: The tires sibilate on the wet road, creating a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The angry goose sibilates at anyone who comes too close.

meanings.sent1: The steam iron sibilates as it presses against the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The dragon toy sibilates when you squeeze it.
meanings.sent3: The old radio sibilates with static before the music starts.
meanings.sent4: The pressure cooker sibilates as it builds up steam.
meanings.sent5: The air mattress sibilates when you lay down on it.
